text:
New Dad George Raises Stink Over Dirty Diaper Duty!

But fed-up Amal won’t let him avoid changing their twins.

THE thrill of being first-time parents after the birth of their twins is over for movie hunk George Clooney and his wife Amal Ñ who are now bickering over the stinky job of changing diapers, sources say.

Shortly after welcoming daughter Ella and son Alexander on June 6, the power couple began trying to dodge diaper duty, an insider claims.
title: New Dad George Raises Stink Over Dirty Diaper Duty!

Read this exciting story from Globe June 26 2017.

But fed-up Amal won’t let him avoid changing their twins.
